content:
I already posted this in the RustSec hello topic, but I just found out that there is a dedicated stream for this.

So let's introduce myself!:
I just graduated from my master Computer Science with a specialization on Cyber security. I have been learning Rust for the past 3/4 months and I really love the language. I saw that some working groups were spinning up, so I thought: Maybe I can be of any help here or there?
sure, take a look at the different working groups; we're trying to documents summarizing all of them over here: https://github.com/rust-lang/compiler-team/tree/master/working-groups
